CAPACITY TO INHERIT
(1) Only a person who is alive at the time of the initiation of the inheritance is able to be an heir.
(2) A child who has already been conceived at the time of the initiation of the inheritance shall be deemed to be born, provided he or she is born alive.
(3) Artificial persons shall be able to inherit on the basis of a will, unless otherwise determined by special regulations.
